project_descr: Capacity Building for Decentralized Urban Governance

outputs.output_descr: SAJI Phase-I implemented preparatory work such as identification of activities and strategies, pilots under the Justice Innovation Fund (JIF), establishment of baseline, mapping exercise to address existing information gaps to contribute inputs to the next phase of an access to justice programme. Five thematic areas for interventions include: informal justice system, formal justice system, criminal justice system, legal aid and legal empowerment. The state level interventions are focused primarily in Haryana, Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra.
